titles.title: To provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Ebenezer D. Bassett, the first African-American diplomat.
Ambassador Ebenezer D. Bassett Commemorative Stamp Act
Ambassador Ebenezer D. Bassett Commemorative Stamp Act
Ambassador Ebenezer D. Bassett Commemorative Stamp Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Ambassador Ebenezer D. Bassett Commemorative Stamp Act
This bill directs the Postmaster General to issue a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Ebenezer D. Bassett.
